hero.description: Dr.Hash is a research & service-driven crypto community founded in 2021, bringing together 22,000+ crypto traders with cutting-edge market insights and trading strategies.

about.title: Bridging the Crypto World
about.description: Since its founding, Dr.Hash has attracted tens of thousands of cryptocurrency traders, including contract and spot traders of mainstream tokens. We have built the most comprehensive trading community with deep partnerships with exchanges like Binance, OKX, and Bitget.
about.description_2: We are also exploring new crypto frontiers including on-chain DeFi, NFT, Depin, Gamefi, and Socialfi to bring better community experiences to crypto users worldwide.

services.title: What We Can Do For You

items.title: Alpha Discovery
items.description: Alpha is our core exploration direction. Through comprehensive research on funding events, track trends, and user data, we identify premium projects.

items.title: Trend Trading
items.description: Using technical analysis tools and indicators to identify market trends and provide community users with trading strategies based on market movements.

items.title: Research Output
items.description: Through in-depth project research, data mining, and operational analysis, we bridge the gap between projects and users for better understanding and wider reach.

items.title: Community Services
items.description: Providing content, user acquisition, marketing and financial data services. Including brand exposure, content marketing, community building, and event planning.

founder.title: Wesley
founder.description: Wesley is a renowned poker player and cryptocurrency investor. He serves as the Chief Investment Officer of a Los Angeles-based family office, independently managing a $300 million fund focused on blockchain, cryptocurrency, stocks, and commodity investments.
achievements: World-class poker player with multiple Texas Hold'em records
CIO of a Los Angeles family office

contact.title: Start Your Crypto Journey
contact.description: Enjoy VIP experience, subscribe to real-time trading strategies, and get assistance with CEX / fund issues. DM @DrhashClub on X for links or contact info.

footer.tagline: Explore the Infinite Possibilities of Crypto
